name: 2048:Which for All You Want
description:
The most entertaining 2048 with the best graphics of all time is now coming!

You haven't heard about 2048? Well, let's show you how to play it. What does 2+2 equal to? It's 4, right! How about 4+4? Of course it's 8. Yo, you are smart! Now you have grasped the basics. You just need to slide your finger to combine the same numbers to get the more advanced numbers. Once 2048 shows up, you win!

Game Features:
1. Innovative usage of cars blocks makes sure you won't get bored throughout your 2048 experience!
2. Visual effects made by the top-ranked senior artists are cool enough to shock you out of your mind!
3. Super cute sound effects that can guide you through the unprecedented kawaii experience!
